game.l_dis:
Play They Are Coming – Fight Off Endless Zombie Waves

They Are Coming – Unblocked is a roguelike, wave-based zombie game where players control a lone survivor fending off hordes of zombies. Survive each day using weapons, traps, and items while earning money to upgrade for tougher challenges ahead.

What is They Are Coming?

They Are Coming combines survival strategy with roguelike mechanics. Players face increasingly difficult zombie waves, managing resources, placing traps, and choosing weapons to maximize survival. The game features an 8-bit retro aesthetic and includes both hardcore survival and free-play "Playground" modes.

How to Play They Are Coming

  • Survive Waves: Fight off zombies in each day and last as long as possible.
  • Use Weapons and Traps: Strategically place traps and use weapons to maximize kills.
  • Earn Money: Collect rewards from zombies to purchase upgrades for the next day.
  • Upgrade Gear: Improve weapons, traps, and abilities to handle tougher waves.
  • Playground Mode: Experiment with strategies and setups without pressure.

Why Play They Are Coming?

The game offers retro 8-bit graphics, challenging roguelike gameplay, and rewarding progression. Fans of survival, strategy, and hardcore difficulty will enjoy the mix of tactical combat and resource management.

Key Features

  • Roguelike Survival: Each day presents new challenges and harder zombie waves.
  • Wave-Based Combat: Defend against hordes using strategy and skill.
  • Retro 8-Bit Aesthetic: Nostalgic pixel-style graphics with classic gameplay feel.
  • Upgrade System: Earn rewards to improve weapons, traps, and survivability.
  • Playground Mode: Freely experiment with weapons and traps.

Can You Survive the Horde?

Face relentless zombie waves, upgrade your gear, and see how long you can last in They Are Coming!
